title: On the thread of a tale
creator_credit: Constantin Mustetea and Animation Film Studio
brief_description: Animated fairy tale with characters created out of a gradually unwinding ball of yarn. Depicts the adventures of Prince Charming and his fabulous horse, in search of his ladylove who has been captured by an ogre.
description: Animated fairy tale with characters created out of a gradually unwinding ball of yarn. Depicts the adventures of Prince Charming and his fabulous horse, in search of his ladylove who has been captured by an ogre.
